[[Kurenai]] attacks her opponent with a triple combo attack dealing an elbow strike and two kicks before fading into a mist in front of the opponent and then appearing again behind them in a pink mist and striking them with a [[kunai]] in the back which then sends the opponent into the air.

[[es:Sueño Hoja Carmesí]]
[[pl:Kōyōmu]]
